“Wasted On You (feat. ROZES)” by Louis Futon is the eighth release from Foreign Family Collective, an outlet for musicians and visual artists alike curated by the duo behind ODESZA

Available for streaming and download on all digital platforms.

“Liz (ROZES) and I found out we were both based in Philly, and a couple weeks later we were writing and recording the track in my basement. We instantly connected and came up with “Wasted On You.”” - Louis Futon
